articles.title: Iran Officially Terminates Decade-Old Nuclear Agreement With World Powers
articles.summary: **Iran** has officially announced the end of its **2015 nuclear agreement**, which had imposed restrictions on its nuclear program. The termination comes amid rising tensions with **Western powers** and follows years of gradual withdrawal from **compliance measures**.

timeline.event: Iran signs nuclear deal with world powers
US withdraws from deal, reimposes sanctions
Iran officially terminates nuclear agreement commitments
IAEA expected to report increased uranium enrichment

articles.title: Trump Blocks Global Maritime Emissions Reduction Agreement
articles.summary: Former president **Donald Trump** has derailed an **International Maritime Organization** vote on reducing shipping emissions by threatening **sanctions**. The decision affects global efforts to cut **maritime pollution** levels at major ports worldwide.

timeline.event: IMO proposes 2030 emissions reduction targets
IMO members agree to 20% reduction
Trump threatens sanctions over maritime emissions deal
Global shipping emissions regulations set to begin

articles.title: AI Market Bubble Now 17 Times Larger Than Dot-Com Era
articles.summary: Ten **AI startups** have accumulated nearly **$1 trillion** in market value over **12 months**, raising concerns of a bubble **17 times** larger than the dot-com era. Analysts warn of potential market correction.

timeline.event: ChatGPT launch sparks massive AI investment surge
Nvidia market value exceeds $1 trillion
Ten AI startups reach $1T valuation
Analysts predict significant AI market correction

articles.title: US Government Seizes Record $15B in Bitcoin Assets
articles.summary: The **U.S. government** has seized **$15 billion** worth of **Bitcoin**, marking the largest cryptocurrency seizure in history. The action raises questions about federal handling of **digital assets** and crypto reserve strategies.

timeline.event: DOJ seizes $3.6B Bitcoin from Bitfinex hack
Couple arrested for laundering stolen cryptocurrency
Government seizes record $15B in Bitcoin assets
Treasury expected to auction seized cryptocurrency

articles.title: Military Drone Industry Attracts Massive Investment Surge
articles.summary: The **military drone** industry is experiencing unprecedented growth with **multi-million dollar** investments. **Defense contractors** worldwide are racing to develop advanced unmanned vehicles, revolutionizing modern warfare capabilities and battlefield technology.

timeline.event: Pentagon launches $2B drone development program
Turkey's Bayraktar drones prove decisive in conflicts
Global defense firms invest billions in drones
AI-powered autonomous drone swarms enter military service

articles.title: Amazon Unveils Plans for Revolutionary Modular Nuclear Reactor
articles.summary: **Amazon** has revealed designs for one of America's first **modular nuclear reactors**, aimed at powering its expanding **AI** and **cloud services**. The facility represents a significant shift toward nuclear energy in tech infrastructure.

timeline.event: Amazon joins Nuclear Innovation Alliance as member
AWS data centers reach record energy consumption
Amazon announces modular nuclear reactor development plans
First Amazon nuclear facility expected operational

articles.title: Japanese Banking Giants Unite to Launch Digital Stablecoins
articles.summary: Japan's top banks **MUFG**, **Sumitomo Mitsui**, and **Mizuho** are collaborating to issue corporate stablecoins pegged to the **yen** and **dollar**. The initiative aims to standardize digital currency settlements nationwide.

timeline.event: Bank of Japan launches digital yen pilot
MUFG tests first corporate stablecoin platform
Three major banks announce joint stablecoin initiative
National stablecoin network expected to launch

articles.title: Meta Introduces Parental Controls for AI Chat Interactions
articles.summary: **Meta** is implementing new safety measures allowing parents to restrict their children's interactions with **AI chatbots**. The controls will affect all **under-18** accounts across Meta's platforms, addressing concerns about AI influence.

timeline.event: Meta launches AI chatbots across social platforms
Teen mental health concerns prompt AI restrictions
Meta introduces parental controls for AI chats
Global rollout of AI controls expected

articles.title: Global Forests Face Unprecedented Fire Risk Due to Climate
articles.summary: Climate change is transforming forests from **Australia** to the **Amazon** into potential firestorms. Rising temperatures and extended **drought periods** have created conditions for more frequent and intense **forest fires** worldwide.

timeline.event: Australia records hottest year, severe drought begins
Amazon rainforest fires reach record-breaking levels
Global forests face unprecedented wildfire risk
UN climate summit to address forest protection

articles.title: India's Chandrayaan-2 Makes Breakthrough Moon-Sun Observation
articles.summary: **Chandrayaan-2**, India's lunar mission, has achieved the first-ever observation of **solar coronal mass ejection** effects on the Moon's atmosphere using its **CHACE-2** payload, marking a significant scientific breakthrough.

timeline.event: Chandrayaan-2 launched from Sriharikota space center
Vikram lander crashed during Moon landing attempt
CHACE-2 observes solar effects on lunar atmosphere
Expected end of Chandrayaan-2 orbital mission

dailyGreeting: Good morning! Brace for major shifts in global markets.

historicalEvents.description: British surrender at Yorktown, ending American Revolutionary War
League of Nations sanctions Italy for invading Ethiopia
Black Monday: Dow Jones falls record 508 points
